text.internet_error: No internet connection. Please connect to the internet and try again.

deck.title: Delete All Cards
deck.content: Are you sure you want to delete all cards in this deck? This action cannot be undone.

tracker.title: Card Tracking Tutorial
tracker.content: On this page, you can scan cards while playing. When a card is scanned, it will be removed from the deck. Scanning it again adds it back. Tap OK to proceed.

card.add_success: Card successfully added to your deck!

deck.share: Your deck log has been copied to the clipboard for easy sharing.
deck.deleted: All cards in the deck deleted successfully.

nfc.unavailable: NFC is unavailable on this device. Ensure that NFC is enabled and supported, then try again.
nfc.not_supported: This NFC tag is not supported. Please use a compatible NFC tag.
nfc.write_failed: Unable to write to the NFC tag. Ensure the tag is writable and has enough storage capacity, then try again.
nfc.read_failed: Unable to read the NFC tag. Please ensure the tag is readable and positioned correctly, then try again.
nfc.write_success: Card information successfully written to the NFC tag.
nfc.read_success: Card successfully read from the NFC tag.

tutorial.index: With NFC technology and this app, managing your cards is easy! Simply scan, track, and organize the cards in your deck with ease. You'll always know what's in your deck, allowing you to focus and enjoy the game more!
tutorial.new_deck: Start building your deck! Add cards, organize them, and prepare for your next game.
tutorial.tracker: Use this feature to track your cards in real-time during a game. Simply scan your cards to update your deck's status.
tutorial.scan: Scan cards with this tool to instantly view their details and status in real-time.
tutorial.games: Choose the game you are playing to customize your decks and track your cards.
tutorial.search: Looking for a card? Use the search feature to find specific cards across all your games.
tutorial.custom: Create unique custom cards with personalized images and descriptions.
tutorial.settings: Customize your app experience by managing your account, adjusting preferences, and exploring additional features.
tutorial.library: Browse all the cards and decks you have created or saved.
